body:
Hello Strawberry55,
Can you give me the permission to translate this doujin [douyara deban no youda!] into Vietnamese ?
Of course, i' d put your credit on the manga link to Strawberry55

Thank you so very much for giving us the opportunity to read those marvelous translated manga.

I hope you will answer soon

Thanks

I would imagine Kirishima to be awesome in bed. 
If he were to use his ability while erect wouldn't technically stay up forever?
